0.title: Welcome to Typem!
0.text: Typem ("Type them") is a time-based game where you try to type out a list of items as quick as you can. It's designed to grow your knowledge, strengthen your memorization skills and be fun!

1.title: Explore Lists
1.text: In the main view, browse through all the available lists and choose one to play.

2.title: Your First Round
2.text: Let's explore this list. Click on the "Let's play"-button or "Next" to start your first round.

3.title: The Game View
3.text: In the game view, you'll see the list you just selected.

4.title: Customization
4.text: Customize the game to your liking in the settings. For example, adjust how often you can pause the game.

5.title: Ready to Play
5.text: Click on the "I'm ready"-button or "Next" to start the game.

6.title: Guess an item
6.text: Type the name of the first planet. Hint: it starts with "M" and ends with "-ercury"

7.title: Guess another item
7.text: Good Job! Now type the name of the next planet. Hint: it starts with "V" and ends with "-enus"

8.title: Running timer
8.text: While playing, the timer is running. To finish the game for now, click the "Give up"-button or "Next".

9.title: Game Over
9.text: When the game ends, the timer stops, and you can see your final time.

10.title: Game Review
10.text: During the game, all your matches will be shown in the item box. Once the game is over, all remaining items will be revealed.

11.title: Track Your Progress
11.text: In the "History" tab, you can view statistics from all your past rounds.

12.title: You're All Set!
12.text: You're all set to start playing! I hope you have fun using the app!
